snippet: No reason was given for the resignation of Sarah J. Dahlgren, who was promoted in recent years as part the Fed’s efforts to bolster its regulatory efforts.
abstract: Sarah J Dahlgren, head of bank supervision at the Federal Reserve Bank of New York, announces plans to leave at the end of 2015; decision comes amid increased criticism of bank's oversight of Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: No reason was given for the resignation of Sarah J. Dahlgren, who was promoted in recent years as part the Fed’s efforts to bolster its regulatory efforts.

headline.main: Sarah Dahlgren, New York Fed’s Top Bank Supervisor, to Leave

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
